description: This client type is comfortable and prefers interacting with technology for their banking needs. They are likely young professionals or tech-savvy individuals who value convenience and efficiency. They are comfortable using mobile apps and online platforms for transactions, account management, and exploring financial products. They are drawn to YONO's integrated platform and its ability to handle various financial needs in one place. They are likely to use features like UPI/BHIM transfers, YONO Cash for ATM withdrawals, and explore e-commerce offers within the app. They may be interested in digital loan options and are receptive to personalized recommendations based on their transaction history and app usage. They are less likely to visit physical branches and prefer self-service options.
